name: Idle Shopping
description:
Build and manage your shopping street! Become a good manager!

In Idle Shopping, Customers can buy what they need in different kinds of stores. You only need to upgrade the stores and hire employees to meet their needs, and you can continue to gain profits.

Game Feature:
1. Hundreds of products can be sold
2. Tap to upgrade and develop your store
3. Colorful 3D scene, Automatic profits

Come and manage and idle shopping Now!
